thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Nhwa Pharmaceutical's stake in unit to be changed to 41.5 pct from 51 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Nhwa Pharmaceutical's stake in unit to be changed to 41.5 pct from 51 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - jiangsu nhwa pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Jiangsu Nhwa Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says an individual, Chen Guanwei plans to inject capital of 11.5 million yuan into co’s Jiangsu-based medical technology unit
* Says an individual, Sun Jiaquan plans to sell all stake in co’s unit
* Says co will hold 41.5 percent in the unit, down from 51 percent
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/nrmZCM
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
